refnamediv.refpurpose: Long term maintenance of cross-build support for the Debian configuration of perl

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: &dhpackage; supports the long term maintenance of cross-build support for the Debian configuration of perl.

&dhpackage; copies pre-produced config files into the current perl build tree to prevent the build from needing to execute test binaries during the configuration stage by providing the values of the tests in advance. &dhpackage; then extracts values from the cached files to update the build information and package Makefiles.

listitem.para: Name of the current perl build variant (static, debug or shared), passed in via debian/rules, must be specified once for each iteration.

Debug support for testing with unreleased config files, uses the files from the rootdir instead of looking in the /usr/share/perl-cross-debian/$(DEB_HOST_GNU_TYPE)/$(PERL_VERSION) directory. ($(PERL_VERSION) in this instance is the output of /bin/bash debian/config.debian --full-version.)
Show summary of options and the version information.

refsect1.title: Extending perl-cross-debian
refsect1.para: &dhpackage; provides some POD documentation of how to extend support to new architectures and how to update existing support for new versions of perl.
